stage_id: Item ID corresponding to this lode

name: Black Iron Lode
desc: A common lode containing black iron, often found in shallow surface layers

name: Red Copper Lode
desc: A red copper lode buried deep underground, often accompanied by fiery heat qi

name: Mithril Deposit
desc: An extremely rare mithril accumulation, shimmering with silver light and brimming with spiritual qi

name: Gengjin Mine
desc: A Gengjin lode located deep in absolute cliffs, extremely difficult to mine but worth a fortune
